H0.text: who began the age of exploration in portugal. King John I of Portugal

H1.text: who began the age of exploration in portugal. Ferdinand Magellan

H2.text: who began the age of exploration in portugal. Bartolomeu Dias

H3.text: who began the age of exploration in portugal. Prince Henry

A4.text: Through his administrative direction, he is regarded as the main initiator of what would be known as the Age of Discovery.

A5.text: Henry sponsored voyages, collecting a 20% tax (o quinto) on profits, the usual practice in the Iberian states at the time.
